name: CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory.unop_tensorμ
initialProofState:
C : Type u_2
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory C
X Y W Z : Opposite C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory.tensorμ X W Y Z).unop (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory.tensorμ (Opposite.unop X) (Opposite.unop Y) (Opposite.unop W) (Opposite.unop Z))
decl:
@[simp] lemma unop_tensorμ {C : Type*} [Category C] [MonoidalCategory C]
    [BraidedCategory C] (X Y W Z : Cᵒᵖ) :
    (tensorμ X W Y Z).unop = tensorμ X.unop Y.unop W.unop Z.unop := by
  simp only [unop_tensorObj, tensorμ, unop_comp, unop_inv_associator, unop_whiskerLeft,
    unop_hom_associator, unop_whiskerRight, unop_hom_braiding, Category.assoc]

name: CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory.op_tensorμ
initialProofState:
C : Type u_2
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory C
X Y W Z : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory.tensorμ X W Y Z).op (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategory.tensorμ { unop := X } { unop := Y } { unop := W } { unop := Z })
decl:
@[simp] lemma op_tensorμ {C : Type*} [Category C] [MonoidalCategory C]
    [BraidedCategory C] (X Y W Z : C) :
    (tensorμ X W Y Z).op = tensorμ (op X) (op Y) (op W) (op Z) := by
  simp only [op_tensorObj, tensorμ, op_comp, op_inv_associator, op_whiskerLeft, op_hom_associator,
    op_whiskerRight, op_hom_braiding, Category.assoc]
